nodes.text: 3 Out-of-This-World Tales! is a compendium title that collects three previously published Star Wars young-readers stories in the World of Reading series: Escape from Darth Vader, AT-AT Attack!, and Ewoks Join the Fight. It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on August 29, 2017, and includes a companion CD to help readers listen along with the story.

This Level 1 Star Wars reader bind up features three stories (Escape from Darth Vader, AT-AT Attack!, and Ewoks Join the Fight) and comes with an accompanying audio CD featuring word-for-word narration of the text.
